ExampleDefinition.Title: Bind Multiple Charts
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use MVVM to databind multiple SciChart charts in a hierarchy of ViewModels. This example creates multiple line charts, with View and ViewModel per chart and one master group ViewModel to contain them all. It shows how to bind SciChart to a data-source and append new data using the MVVM pattern.
